TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SettingAttribute extends System.Attribute

Docs.summary: Represents a custom settings attribute used to associate settings information with a settings property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The SettingAttribute class associates settings information with a settings property. The <xref:System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase> class will ignore all properties not marked with this or a derived attribute.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
